title: Lexus Urban Polo
description: The Lexus Urban Polo® returns to the beautiful Hagley Park, Christchurch on Saturday, 21 February 2026. Get amongst all the action on and off the field.
location: Hagley Park, Christchurch | This is an R18 event, 12:00 – 7:30pm • Doors open 12:00pm

title: The Art of Banksy
description: Enjoy over 150 original artworks, prints, and installations by the elusive street artist right here in Ōtautahi Christchurch.

title: Supercars Christchurch Super 440
description: Ōtautahi Christchurch is set to welcome Australasia’s premier touring car series, Repco Supercars Championship to Ruapuna Motorsport Park, 17-19 April 2026.

title: Super Rugby Pacific - Super Round
description: Super Round is a festival weekend of Super Rugby Pacific where every team plays at One New Zealand Stadium Christchurch, across three days over ANZAC weekend.
location: One New Zealand Stadium, 218 Madras Street, Christchurch

title: West Indies v BLACKCAPS
description: Caribbean flair meets Kiwi fire. The BLACKCAPS face the West Indies in the first Test Match of the series.

title: New Years Eve
description: Ōtautahi Christchurch, your biggest, free NYE party is back! Enjoy the kids countdown from 4-7pm, followed by Kora and guests through to midnight.

title: World Buskers Festival
description: The World Buskers Festival returns to Ōtautahi Christchurch for ten days of street performance, ticketed shows, and pop-up surprises across the city.

title: Crankworx Christchurch
description: From 19–22 February, the world’s best mountain bikers will descend on Christchurch Adventure Park for a four-day celebration of speed and skill.

title: NZ Squash Open
description: Get ready for world-class action as the NZ Squash Open returns in 2026! This premier tournament will showcase the world’s top professional players.
